issue.title: DRCSim Compile Instructions Need to be updated for DRCSim 2.0

content.raw:
Just got it to work on Ubuntu 12.10. Here are my notes

Installing ROS Groovy

Follow the instructions on http://www.ros.org/wiki/groovy/Installation/Ubuntu and do the Desktop-Full Install

The short version is

     sudo sh -c 'echo "deb http://packages.ros.org/ros/ubuntu quantal main" > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ros-latest.list'

    wget http://packages.ros.org/ros.key -O - | sudo apt-key add -

    sudo apt-get update

    sudo apt-get install ros-groovy-desktop-full

Installing build dependencies

    sudo apt-get install build-essential cmake libfreeimage-dev libprotoc-dev\
                         libprotobuf-dev protobuf-compiler freeglut3-dev libcurl4-openssl-dev \
                         libtinyxml-dev libtar-dev libtbb-dev libogre-dev \
                         libxml2-dev pkg-config libqt4-dev ros-fuerte-urdfdom libltdl-dev libboost-thread-dev \
                         libboost-signals-dev libboost-system-dev libboost-filesystem-dev libboost-program-options-dev \
                         libboost-regex-dev libboost-iostreams-dev debhelper mercurial

Installing orsf-common

This requires some magic.

Check out osrf-common

    hg clone #!/osrf/osrf-common osrf-common

Setup build envirionment

    source /opt/ros/groovy/setup.bash

    export ROS_PACKAGE_PATH=$ROS_PACKAGE_PATH:`pwd`/osrf-common/ros

    cd osrf-common

    mkdir build

Compile osrf-common

    cd build

    cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/opt/ros/groovy ../

    make

    sudo make install

Installing sandia-hand

This also requires some magic

Check out sandia-hand

    hg clone #!/osrf/sandia-hand sandia-hand

Setup build envirionment

    source /opt/ros/groovy/setup.bash

    export ROS_PACKAGE_PATH=$ROS_PACKAGE_PATH:`pwd`/sandia-hand/ros

    cd sandia-hand

    mkdir build

Compile sandia-hand

    cd build

    cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/opt/ros/groovy ../

    make

    sudo make install

Installing Gazebo

Short version

    hg clone #!/osrf/drcsim

    cd drcsim

    mkdir build

    cd build

    source /opt/ros/groovy/setup.bash

    cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr ..

    make

    make install

Installing DRCSim

Short version

    hg clone #!/osrf/drcsim

    cd drcsim

    mkdir build

    cd build

    source /opt/ros/groovy/setup.bash

    source /usr/share/gazebo/setup.sh

    cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr ..

    make

    make install

Running DRCSim

Add "source /usr/share/drcsim/setup.sh" to ~/.bashrc and start a new terminal

No hands

roslaunch atlas_utils atlas.launch

Sandia hands

roslaunch atlas_utils atlas_sandia_hands.launch

iRobot hands

roslaunch atlas_utils atlas_irobot_hands.launch
